speech.0: Let me reject violence and extremism and call for tolerance and fraternity. We believe that it is the duty of the international community to consider seriously the causes of this phenomenon and to devise ways to confront it and eradicate it once and for all. Fulfilling the commitments that the international community made in creating this Organization will only be possible if all peoples and all countries share the available resources and possibilities for successful development, and if the policies of the countries of the North are rooted in a vision of dignified, free and equal existence for all. In my view this is the only way to reach the objectives that this Organization was created for.
